description: E6878-370 with versions of 10.0.3.1(H557SP27C233), 10.0.3.1(H563SP1C00), 10.0.3.1(H563SP1C233) has a use after free vulnerability. The software references memory after it has been freed in certain scenario, the attacker does a series of crafted operations through web portal, successful exploit could cause a use after free condition which may lead to malicious code execution.
